content.text:
# St. Xavier's College, Nuwara Eliya

|footnotes              =
}}
'''St Xavier's College, Nuwara Eliya''' is a boys' public national school in Nuwara Eliya, Sri Lanka.
See also
* List of schools in Central Province, Sri Lanka
* List of Jesuit sites
